text.jpText:
さて、と……初稿はそのように相成ったわけだが、
忌憚ない意見を聞かせてくれないか。
text.enText:
Well then, that should be enough materials for the first draft. Please 
give me your honest opinion on them.

text.jpText:
うんうん。どれもいい素材だね。
……ふふっ。活き活きスポット巡り、楽しかったな。
text.enText:
Sure, sure. These are good. Fufu, it sure was interesting looking 
through all these high-spirited spots.

text.jpText:
みんなバラバラの場所を案内してくれて、“活き活き”の形も
それぞれだったけどさ。それがまた、アタシたちらしいっていうか。
text.enText:
The places that everyone showed off were completely all over the place. 
Not to mention what made them feel alive differed too. It really 
captured the individuality of each person.

text.jpText:
ああ。私も生徒の多様さを改めて感じることができて、感慨深いよ。
……本当に、学びの多い時間だった。
text.enText:
Yes. The student council and I got to see and feel a variety of 
different places. From there we were able to feel a wide depth of 
emotion. It really was a good learning experience.

text.jpText:
……どんな“活き活きできる場所”にいても、
みんな、最後にはレースのことばっか考えてたね――
text.enText:
No matter what kind of “high-spirited spot” people brought up, it all 
circled back to their thoughts of races.

text.jpText:
……で、こっちは……学外のウマ娘とレースを通じて交流、かぁ。
ポッケたち、面白いことしてるね。
text.enText:
And this is… “A cultural exchange with uma musume from outside the 
school that we raced with.” Pokke and her friends sure are amusing.

text.jpText:
ははっ、集合写真いいねこれ。
『レースで本気で競ったからこその“活き活きとした友情”』か――
text.enText:
Ha ha. This group photo is nice. “A high-spirited friendship born from 
an earnest race with each other.”

text.jpText:
レースを通じ、繋がるものを感じさせてくれる……
素晴らしい1枚だと思うよ。
text.enText:
A race that can connect the feelings of 
so many people. That is a good piece.

text.jpText: ……うん。これもまた、アタシたちらしい姿だね。
text.enText: Yes. Once again, their experiences mirrored ours.

text.jpText:
で、これは――オープンキャンパスの写真？
へぇ……そう来たか。
text.enText:
What is this? A photo from the open campus? 
I see. So, she really did come.

text.jpText: ふふ、送り主には私も驚かされたよ。
text.enText: Ha ha. I was also surprised who sent the photo.

text.jpText:
……この素材にはね、『学園とは未来のレースを育む場所』という
言葉が添えられていたんだ。
text.enText:
These photos were said to capture “the place where the academy nurtures 
the race of the future.”

text.jpText:
生徒と、未来にターフで交わるかもしれない子どもたちとの
交流の様子には確かに……“活き活きとした未来”が感じ取れたよ。
text.enText:
The students and the children who would step on the turf in the future 
were able to come together and demonstrate the feeling of creating a 
“high-spirited future.”

text.jpText: ははっ、彼女らしいね。
text.enText: Ha ha. That's just like her.

text.jpText:
……他にも『カフェテリア活き活き大食い記録』に、
こっちは『活き活き尻尾ケアアイテム紹介』。へ～……――
text.enText:
Other submissions include a “snapshot of a cafeteria of high-spirited 
eaters” and a “high-spirited showcase of tail care items.” I see.

text.jpText:
――ふふっ。
こうして、いろいろ見させてもらったけど…………うん。
text.enText: Fufu. I got to see a lot of different things but… Yeah.

text.jpText: 今のままじゃあ、このパンフはまだ未完成だね。
text.enText: At least right now, the pamphlet is still far from finished.

text.jpText:
……ああ、そうだな。ここには決定的なものが足りない。
活力の源泉。あらゆる想いが繋がる場所。すなわち――
text.enText:
Right you are. We still lack enough items that we can definitively use. 
All these things share a major source of life and showcase a place 
where people's minds become one. In other words…

text.jpText: “レース”が。
text.enText: A race.

text.jpText: ――これ見た？　パンフ撮影用の特別レース大会だって！
text.enText:
Did you see? Apparently, they're holding a special race for those that 
submitted stuff for the pamphlet!

text.jpText:
素材提供者なら誰でも参加できるのが、すごいよね。
色んな人とレースできるチャンスだ……！
text.enText:
Because anyone could have submitted materials, anyone 
can participate in the race. That's really interesting. 
This is a chance for all types of people to race!

text.jpText:
――いやぁ、トレーニングに精が出るね。
よもやここまで特別レースに前向きとは、驚きだ！
text.enText:
Well, you sure are putting in a lot of effort into training. I sure 
wasn't expecting you to come to this special race head on.

text.jpText:
……勝手に参加登録しておいて……よく言います……。
それも……私だけではなく、ポッケさんまで……――
text.enText:
That's rich coming from someone that registered us 
both without asking. You didn't just stop at that, 
you just also had to drag Pokke into this too.

text.jpText:
群愚丹瑠とのレースで、君たちの情報は十分に得られたのだが……
せっかく訪れた機会、サンプルは多いに越したことはないだろう？
text.enText:
From the race with Gungnir, I was able to get some good data. However, 
I just happened upon another chance to get more. You can never have too 
many samples, can you?

text.jpText:
――それに、見てみたいじゃあないか。
1度共に走り、反響し合った我々が、次にどんな走りをするのかを！
text.enText:
Also, I know that you also would like to test yourself. I wonder what 
sort of running we are able to have from running together.

text.jpText:
フフ。君もこれだけ熱心に走り込んでいるのだから、
そのクチかと思ったんだがね――
text.enText: Fufu. Seeing you run here so seriously, I bet you're thinking the same.

text.jpText:
……私は……私が感じるままに……
自分の力を試したいだけ……磨きたいだけ……。
text.enText:
I-I just felt the urge to test my own strength. 
And just wanted to maybe improve it…

text.jpText: ……今回はその舞台が……たまたま現れた……それだけです……――
text.enText: This is just a situation that happened to pop up. That's all.

text.jpText: ……試したい、磨きたい、ねぇ。
text.enText: She wanted to test and improve her strength, huh?

text.jpText:
ククッ。やはり君も、私と変わらないじゃないか。
……実に楽しいレースとなりそうだ。そうだろう？　ポッケ君――
text.enText:
Kuku. In the end, you're no different from me. This is turning out to 
be quite an interesting race, don't you think so Pokke?

text.jpText:
――おらおらおらおらおらァッ！　まだまだブチあげるからなッ！！
お前ら、ナメた走りしてんじゃねぇぞッ！！
text.enText:
Ora ora ora ora ora ora! I can still keep going 
faster! You lot better not hold back either!

text.jpText: は、はいッ！！！
text.enText: Y-yes!

text.jpText:
――っし。休憩終わったらお前ら、もう1回付き合え。
血反吐出るぐれーまで追い込んでくぞ。ついてこい。
text.enText:
Alright. After our break, go for another round. We're going to keep 
going until we vomit our guts out. Come on!

text.jpText: うすっ！！
text.enText: Understood!

text.jpText:
……タキオン、カフェ。
あのレースで、お前らのことが改めてよ～くわかった。
text.enText:
Tachyon. Café. From that previous race, I 
feel I got to know you two really well.

text.jpText:
何考えてんのかわかんないことが多いけどよ、
お前らの、あの日の走りは――
text.enText:
I still don't know what exactly goes through your mind, but on that 
day, your running was saying…

text.jpText:
『俺より強い奴はぶっ倒す』。『ぜってーレースでは勝つ』。
そんなギラついたのが、溢れ出てたぜ……！
text.enText:
“I want to crush anyone stronger than me” and “I will 
definitely win this race.” That was the sort of feeling 
I could feel overflowing from you two.

text.jpText:
澄ました顔しやがって、結局はお前らも俺と同じ――
“頂点”目指して走る、ウマ娘だ……！
text.enText:
Your faces made it clear as day. In the end, you two are like me. You 
are uma musume that are gunning for the peak!

text.jpText:
面白くなってきやがった――
必ずぶち抜いて、誰が“頂点”か刻んでやるよ……！
text.enText:
This is getting interesting. No matter what, I will take down anyone 
who tries to take the peak from me!

text.jpText:
はぁっ……はぁっ……はぁ……
ふぅ……――
text.enText: Huff, huff, huff. Hah.

text.jpText:
……姉様が私に、かの特別レースを走る機会を与えてくれたのは、
『報いてみせよ』という挑発……もう、不甲斐ない走りは見せない。
text.enText:
Nee-sama gave me the challenge to try to pay her back in this special 
race. I can't show her such disappointing running again.

text.jpText:
“今”の私は、もう貴方の陰に隠れてばかりではないと……
証明してみせる……！
text.enText:
The current me has no desire to remain in your 
shadow any longer! I'll prove that to you!

text.jpText: …………あの、ラモーヌさん。
text.enText: Excuse me, Ramonu?

text.jpText:
どうして……アタシを、素材提供者として……
特別レースに出られるようにしてくれたんですか……？
text.enText:
Why did you choose to have me participate in this special race as the 
person that submitted the photos?

text.jpText:
不思議な問い。
貴方は私と走りたくないの？
text.enText: What a strange question. Is it not true that you wish to run with me?

text.jpText: それは――
text.enText: That's…

text.jpText: ――そんなはずはないでしょう？　ドーベル。
text.enText: “There's no way I can do that?” Is what you were going to say, Dober?

text.jpText:
私とアルダンが併走した時に、貴方がその内に垣間見せた牙。
……貴方が走りたいと願う理由。
text.enText:
When Ardan and I were facing off, I could tell that you were itching 
for a fight. It is because you too wish to run.

text.jpText:
それを存分に振るいなさい。
そして私に、与えて頂戴。
text.enText: In that case, do not hold back. In return, I will accept your feelings.

text.jpText: ――熱く。深く。この胸を焦がす、レースを。
text.enText: That endless, burning heart of yours. I want to see it in the race.

text.jpText:
……この前は見ているだけしか、憧れることしかできませんでした。
でも、今度の特別レースでは……――
text.enText:
All I could do before was watch from far away and admire you. But 
during the special race…

text.jpText:
アタシは、アタシらしく……ラモーヌさんやみんなと、
堂々と向き合いたい……！　全力で、走りたい……！！
text.enText:
I would like to run my own race against you and the others! I want to 
face you head on with all I got!

text.jpText:
そして……その走りをもって……！！
ラモーヌさんにとって、忘れられないレースにしてみせます……！
text.enText:
And with that, I would like to make my running 
a race that you could never forget!

text.jpText:
ふふ――可愛い子。
……相対するのが、楽しみね。
text.enText: Fufu. What a precious girl. I will be looking forward to facing you.
